content: materials * super bulky yarn i used 2 skeins of wool-ease thick & quick - 106 yds each to fill a 7-foot tree * 6 5mm and 3 25mm hook 6 5mm for the yarn & 3 25mm for the beads * 12mm wooden beads with 3mm hole see pattern for link to beads used - 172 for a 24 ft long garland * scissors * optional jar opener or deflated balloon sizing one skein of super bulky yarn that is about 106 yards long worked with 1 bead in between each puff 172 beads total equals about 24 5 feet long depending on how densely you want your garland laced around your tree i would recommend 2-3 garlands for a 7-8 foot tree
